item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/battle_symphony.md#they-say-that-i-dont-belong-vyl-wnanory|Take me back to the rivers of belief]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/battle_symphony.md#they-say-that-i-dont-belong-vyl-wnanory|Take me back to the rivers of belief, my friend]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/battle_symphony.md#they-say-that-i-dont-belong-vyl-wnanory|I look inside my heart]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/one_more_light/battle_symphony.
